comments:
Description:
Erorr occurs in web viewer when access data in masterpage.

Steps to reproduce:
1.Create a dataset.
2.In the masterpage, pull a data from dataset to the header. 
3.Preview in web viewer, error pops up.

Error log:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

The following items have errors: 


report report: 
- There are errors evaluating script "row["CUSTOMERNUMBER"]". 
Error.ScriptEvaluationError ( 1 time(s) )

model issue?  incorrect expression on the data item?

It works in preview in layout or preview in html. It should be viewer bug.
The data is just a column of dataset.
When the report body has no content, the content in master page will not be executed. So this bug is fixed by creating an empty page content if the report is empty.
